snippet: David Letterman on Monday commented on the shooting in Newtown, Conn., by talking about his concerns as the parent of a young boy, while Jimmy Kimmel could barely get through his brief comments because his voice was so choked.
abstract: David Letterman on Monday commented on the shooting in Newtown, Conn., by talking about his concerns as the parent of a young boy, while Jimmy Kimmel could barely get through his brief comments because his voice was so choked.

headline.main: For Late-Night Hosts, a Struggle to Confront the News
